title: This year's Super Bowl commercials feature AI, weight-loss drugs and celebrities galore
description: This year's Super Bowl commercials are set to feature AI, artificial intelligence, weight-loss drugs and celebrities galore during Sunday's big game.
content:

title: Data Doctors: Why Google Photos search feels broken
description: Google Photos’ search function is now driven by artificial intelligence, and users have said that’s causing headaches. Here are tips to navigate the change.
content:
Q: Why is Google Photos AI search so bad and can I turn it off?

title: Sell-off, what sell-off? Dow shrugs off AI fears to surge past 50,000
description: The US equity index reached a record high on Friday despite sharp falls across Wall Street this week amid fears of over-investment in artificial intelligence
content:

title: Exclusive: Vista Equity Partners and Intel to lead investment in AI chip startup SambaNova, sources say

title: Apple plans to allow external voice-controlled AI chatbots in CarPlay, Bloomberg News reports
description: Apple is preparing to allow voice-controlled artificial intelligence apps from other companies in CarPlay, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.
content: The change represents a strategic shift for Apple, which, until now, has only allowed its own Siri assistant as a voice-control option. With this move, users will be able to query AI chatbots from other companies through CarPlay's vehicle interface f... [574 chars]
